programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: The Romantic Songs playlist is a collection of the sweetest and most heart-fluttering K-pop tracks. Filled with dreamy melodies, heartfelt lyrics, and charming performances, this playlist captures the essence of love in all its forms. From playful confessions to deep emotions, every song adds a romantic touch. Whether you're falling in love or reminiscing about precious memories, this playlist is the perfect soundtrack for the moment! (Track List: JOYURI - GLASSY / TWS - plot twist / POW - Boyfriend / NCT DREAM - My First and Last / TWICE - YES or YES / ILLIT - Magnetic / THE BOYZ - Bloom Bloom / woo!ah! - Rollercoaster / NCT 127 - TOUCH / OH MY GIRL - NONSTOP / ENHYPEN - Not For Sale / STAYC - STEREOTYPE / ONF - Complete / IZONE - Violeta / SEVENTEEN - Pretty U / Apink - Mr. Chu (On Stage) / Lovelyz - Ah-Choo / TWS - If I’m S, Can You Be My N? / Girls' Generation - Lion Heart / IZONE - UP / TWICE - LIKEY / DKZ - Cupid / STAYC - ASAP / GFRIEND - Me Gustas Tu / TXT - Blue Hour / DRIPPIN - Weekend / KISS OF LIFE - Sticky / Lovelyz - Candy Jelly Love / CRAVITY - Cloud 9 / The Wind - Hello, My First Love / TWICE - What is Love? / EPEX - My Girl / PENTAGON - Shine / OH MY GIRL - Real Love / MADEIN - UNO / BOYNEXTDOOR - OUR / ATEEZ - Celebrate / ENHYPEN - Paranormal / BTOB - Only one for me / N.Flying - Spring Memories / YENA - SUGAR / ZEROBASEONE - and I / Billlie - remembrance candy / N.Flying - Rooftop)
